source.sqlReaderQuery:
Declare @temp Table(EQUIP_CLASS_CD nvarchar(50))

INSERT INTO @temp
SELECT
  DISTINCT EQUIP_CLASS_CD 
FROM
  xls_v_Equipment_Registration
WHERE
  OPTN_WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'

SELECT DISTINCT
  S.[TYPE] AS FAILURE_CODE_TYPE,
  S.CODE AS FAILURE_CODE,
  S.DESP
FROM
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1 
  LEFT JOIN SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE, 
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2
WHERE
  E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
  AND S.[TYPE] = 'FAILURE_CODE'
  AND E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD IN (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT EQUIP_CLASS_CD
    FROM
      @temp
  )
UNION

-- Failure Cause Code
SELECT DISTINCT
  S.[TYPE],
  S.CODE,
  S.DESP
FROM
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1 
  LEFT JOIN SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE, 
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2
WHERE
  E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
  AND S.[TYPE] = 'FAILURE_CAUSE_CODE'
  AND E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD IN (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT EQUIP_CLASS_CD
    FROM
      @temp
  )
UNION
-- Failure Action Code
SELECT DISTINCT
  S.[TYPE],
  S.CODE,
  S.DESP
FROM
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1 
  LEFT JOIN SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE, 
  EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2
WHERE
  E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
  AND S.[TYPE] = 'FAILURE_ACTION_CODE'
  AND E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD IN (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT EQUIP_CLASS_CD
    FROM
      @temp
  )
